thought: The error indicates that trigger_0 function requires an input_data argument, but it was called without any argument in mainWorkflow. Also, action_0 returns an empty list, possibly because the input_data passed to it is empty or incorrect. I need to fix the trigger_0 call by passing None explicitly, and ensure proper data flow between functions. Also, action_1 params are empty, so I need to implement them for sending Slack messages.
plan: Modify trigger_0 call in mainWorkflow to pass None explicitly.
Implement action_1 params for sending messages to Slack channel 'general' with text field.
Retest the workflow after these changes.
criticism: Current code calls trigger_0 without input_data argument, causing TypeError. Also, action_1 params are missing, so Slack messages cannot be sent.
